ygData.subject: [ANN]: HBase-Writer 0.90.3 available for download

Subject: [ANN]: HBase-Writer 0.90.3 available for download
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=345464853


--f46d04088df34cda0c04b1df1cbf
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

The HBase-Writer team is happy to announce that HBase-Writer 0.90.3 is
available for download:

    http://code.google.com/p/hbase-writer/downloads/list

HBase-Writer 0.90.3 is a maintenance release that fixes library
compatibility since older
versions of Heritrix and HBase. More details may be found on the
HBase-Writer blog [1].

Users upgrading from previous versions of HBase-Writer are recommended to
upgrade to Heritrix 3.1.0
and HBase 0.90.3.

Thanks to Karthik MV for contributing the initial changes to this release!

-The HBase-Writer Team

1.
http://opensourcemasters.com/weblog/general/hbase-writer-0.90.3-released.html

--f46d04088df34cda0c04b1df1cbf
